thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN PREMIER Faubourg 88 - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: All good except strange sound at night
thread.title_full: All good except strange sound at night - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Faubourg 88, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: AnnaEE2017
title: All good except strange sound at night
text: Clean and nice hotel, didn't have breakfast but it looked alright and simple. However the sleep quality was not the best, there were sounds (like dripping and other people flushing) from the bathroom at night which was annoying and you could clearly hear the cars outside and the garbage trucks in the morning.
